name: PlantoMart
description: Planto-Mart is a full stack Ecommerce Multi-Vendor Platform, enabling vendors to list products, facilitating customers to purchase products across different vendors. Each Vendor has it's own Dashboard to manage all of it's shop's products and view analytics and much more

name: MetaRepo
description: An opensource initiative as Comprehensive Monorepo  containing all deployable templates for modern web applications, covering a wide range of use cases and tech stacks.

name: EHCF Healthcare Platform
description: A Healthcare platform using B2B APIs to connect patients with healthcare providers and manage medical records securely over serverless infrastructure.
